name: v0.0.2
body:
## What's Changed
* [publish] do not attempt to create attestations by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/67
* [ci] use pwsh for windows; bash for linux, mac by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/69
* [ci] drop windows tests by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/71
* Run and verify buildifier by @fmeum in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/68
* [ci] do not cache test runs by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/73
* [ci] re-enable Windows bzlmod test by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/74


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2

name: v0.0.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Apple Silicon improvements by @BalestraPatrick in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/2
* Fix incompatibilities with upcoming Bazel 6.x by @bduffany in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/3
* update the rest of @bazel_tools//platforms to @platforms by @kevinchen-verkada in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/6
* Add Ubuntu 20.04 toolchain by @bduffany in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/7
* Update WORKSPACE snippet by @bduffany in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/8
* Make buildbuddy toolchain use c++17 standard when compiling c++ by @iain-macdonald in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/9
* Set dockerNetwork=off by default by @tylerwilliams in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/11
* Offer more granular platform options by @tempoz in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/12
* Add environment variable override for external_cc by @tempoz in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/13
* Revert "Add environment variable override for external_cc" by @tempoz in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/14
* Revert "Offer more granular platform options" by @tempoz in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/15
* Fix UBUNTU16_04_IMAGE path by @siggisim in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/16
* toolchain: allow to pass extra cxx_builtin_include_directories by @manuelnaranjo in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/17
* rules: remove unused substitutions by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/20
* upkeep: update deps and deprecate java_version by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/19
* further cleanup by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/21
* Provide examples for using buildbuddy-toolchain by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/22
* windows: initial windows toolchain by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/23
* Fix JVM opts load with Bazel dev versions by @fmeum in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/24
* Add `allow_empty = True` to `glob` by @aherrmann in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/26
* container image: set 20.04 as the default image by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/25
* Deprecate LLVM support by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/29
* Add support for `aarch64` for linux by @tempoz in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/30
* Simplify multi-arch toolchain config by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/32
* Enable bzlmod by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/27
* Fix missing templating in Windows toolchain by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/28
* Prepare for 0.0.1 release by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/33
* bzlmod: drop exec platforms registration by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/35
* bzlmod: use publish-to-bcr by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/36
* Fix arm64 toolchains for bzlmod by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/37
* bcr: fix metadata json by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/38
* Add include paths to input root tree by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/41
* README: add information about 22.04 image by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/43
* fix: gcc_version in bzlmod extension by @jjmaestro in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/39
* pin rules_cc by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/42
* Add alias for //platforms:host_compatible by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/46
* Fix visibility issue on alias targets by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/47
* examples/bzlmod: add docs for register_toolchains by @sluongng in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/48
* Add ubuntu 24.04 by @bduffany in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/49
* Update WORKSPACE snippet and fix typos in README by @bduffany in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/50
* [ci] Build examples/bzlmod for PRs, merges to `master` by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/55
* bump rules_cc to 0.2.8 in examples/bzlmod by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/57
* [ci] add MacOS and Windows local builds by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/56
* [ci] build examples/bzlmod from linux, mac hosts using linux x86_64 and arm64 RBE by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/60
* [ci] test local and RBE builds for examples/workspace by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/62
* [test] Add integration tests for local and RBE builds of bzlmod, workspace examples by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/63
* workflow to publish module to BCR by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/64
* [bcr] consistently use {REPO}-{TAG} for tarball, prefix by @dan-stowell in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/65

## New Contributors
* @BalestraPatrick made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/2
* @bduffany made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/3
* @kevinchen-verkada made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/6
* @iain-macdonald made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/9
* @tylerwilliams made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/11
* @tempoz made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/12
* @siggisim made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/16
* @manuelnaranjo made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/17
* @sluongng made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/20
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/24
* @aherrmann made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/26
* @jjmaestro made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/39
* @dan-stowell made their first contribution in https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/pull/55

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/buildbuddy-io/buildbuddy-toolchain/commits/v0.0.1

name: v0.0.1-rc1
body:
# v0.0.1-rc1 release

This is a pre-release to help test our BCR integration.

DO NOT USE
